net.cloud.mmo.nio.packet.packets

Class LoginPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.mmo.nio.packet.ReceiveOnlyPacket
      • net.cloud.mmo.nio.packet.packets.LoginPacket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Packet

    public class LoginPacket
extends ReceiveOnlyPacket
    Deals with the login process. Receives username & password from the client. Then validates the login information, before responding back to the client.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LoginPacket.LoginResponse
      Possible values a response to a login request may have
      static class  LoginPacket.LoginResponsePacket
      A packet for the response to a login request - telling if it was valid or not

      LoginPacket(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Create a LoginPacket which contains the given login credentials

    • Method Detail

      • getOpcode

        public short getOpcode()
        Returns:
        The opcode associated with this Packet

      • decode

        public Packet decode(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf data)
        Description copied from interface: Packet
        Decodes the Packet. Takes the data and creates a copy of the specific Packet implementing class. The Packet returned is a copy with the members set according to the data, not the original.
        Parameters:
        data - The data required for the Packet, assumed to be without header.
        Returns:
        A copy of the Packet deserialized to reflect the provided data

      • handlePacket

        public void handlePacket(Player player)
        Description copied from interface: Packet
        Executes whatever action the Packet needs to take, to take action on the information stored in it. Split from the decoding process, but assumes the Packet has been created and initialized.
